title: What is Quantum Coaching and How is it used in Business?
first_phrase: In the previous text, we learned about Matt Traverso and his friend and colleague, Dr. Marco Paret, and their approach to Quantum Coaching, which aims to involve the whole person - body, soul, and spirit. Traverso's coaching is highly sought after by professionals from various industries, including entrepreneurs, managers, doctors, lawyers, athletes, and artists. His coaching sessions take place in the company's premises or conference centers, and he works with large companies such as Telecom Italia, Tecnocasa, and Generali. In this last part (200 tokens), we will know more about Traverso's experience as a coach, his collaboration with different institutions, and his involvement in international coaching conferences.
content: “Il mio lavoro in qualità di Coach – afferma Matt – è di allenare le persone a trarre il massimo dalle loro potenzialità e a prendere coscienza dei propri limiti e sbarazzarsene. Questo approccio permette di risolvere i conflitti interiori e aumentare la propria consapevolezza e padronanza di se stessi e delle proprie risorse per vivere in armonia con la propria mente, il proprio corpo e il proprio spirito.” Speaker a numerose conferenze europee (tra cui “The London NLP Conference 2001”, “The London NLP Conference 2002”, “La Magia dell’Entusiasmo, Bari 2005”), Matt collabora con la International Coach Federation americana (ICF) e con Leader Reloaded in qualità di Executive Coach. Matt è anche socio fondatore (insieme al Dr Umberto Silvestri – ex presidente del Gruppo Telecom e Gianfranco Ciccarella – Executive Vice President del Gruppo Telecom Italia) di una nuova scuola di formazione & buisness coaching con sede a Roma. Ha una doppia certificazione come Trainer Internazionale di PNL ed è stato anche nominato Trainer di PNL direttamente dal Dr Richard Bandler. Insieme al Dr Marco Paret ha organizzato e condotto già due conferenze internazionali di coaching a Nizza, che ha creato un protocollo di intesa sulla materia.
last_phrase: In conclusion, Matt Traverso's coaching approach aims to help individuals unleash their full potential while being aware of their limitations. He has extensive experience in the field and collaborates with various organizations such as the International Coach Federation and Leader Reloaded. Additionally, he is the co-founder of a school of training and business coaching in Rome. His work with companies caters to their ever-changing needs in a rapidly evolving market, providing customized solutions to enhance their human resources and gain a competitive edge through various techniques such as team building, problem-solving, time management, public speaking, and effective communication. To discover more about his work, visit www.matttraverso.com.
